compress.title: Compress Video
compress.description: Reduce video file size while maintaining quality.

toolInfo.title: Video Compression
toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to compress video files to reduce their size while maintaining acceptable quality. You can adjust the compression level to balance between file size and video quality.

toolInfo.title: Video Rotation
toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to rotate video files by a specified angle. You can rotate videos by 90, 180, or 270 degrees, or any custom angle.

toolInfo.title: Video Flip
toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to flip video files horizontally or vertically. Horizontal flip creates a mirror effect, while vertical flip turns the video upside down.

loop.title: Loop Video
loop.description: Create a looping video by repeating the original video multiple times.

toolInfo.title: What is a {{title}}?
toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to create a looping video by repeating the original video multiple times. You can specify how many times the video should loop.

cropVideo.title: Crop Video
cropVideo.description: Crop video to remove unwanted areas.
cropVideo.loadVideoForDimensions: Load a video to see dimensions
cropVideo.errorNonNegativeCoordinates: X and Y coordinates must be non-negative
cropVideo.errorPositiveDimensions: Width and height must be positive
cropVideo.errorBeyondWidth: Crop area extends beyond video width ({{width}}px)
cropVideo.errorBeyondHeight: Crop area extends beyond video height ({{height}}px)
cropVideo.errorCroppingVideo: Error cropping video. Please check parameters and video file.

toolInfo.title: Crop Video
toolInfo.description: This tool allows you to crop video files to remove unwanted areas. You can specify the crop area by setting the X, Y coordinates and width, height dimensions.
